original_text: and Jesus healed many who had various diseases. He also drove out many demons, but he would not let the demons speak because they knew who he was.
korean_text: 예수께서 각종 병이 든 많은 사람을 고치시며 많은 귀신을 내쫓으시되 귀신이 자기를 알므로 그 말하는 것을 허락하지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: He also drove out many demons
but he would not let the demons speak
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그분은 귀신들이 말하는 것을 허락하지 않으셨다

sentences.original_text: because they knew who he was
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 그분이 누구신지 알고 있었기 때문이다
